## Import.Importers.PathImporter.ignoreFileTypes property

The types of files to ignore when importing. Any file not ignored is converted to an [IImportableFsItem](./ts-res.import.iimportablefsitem.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly ignoreFileTypes: string[];
```
